comment: This was a preset course. The only responsibilities for this professor were to grade and respond to student emails. She was impossible to get a hold of and failed to grade in a timely fashion. There is a three part lesson plan group project, but she wouldn't grade in time to submit the next part. I would define this class as endless busywork.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Tough grader

comment: TERRIBLE Hard to get a hold of. Will not give 100s. She is so hard to get any information about what she wants in your assignments. If you can don't take her.

Professor is fine, the class is generally hard. She can be very passive-aggressive. Large assignments, the open note take-home test took me about 9 hours to finish. Many of my classmates also spent about 7 hours on that assignment, which there are two in the semester. No quizzes. Discussion every week, along with an additional assignment.
She really wants students to succeed in her class. The feedback is great and she's very supportive.
